input.sentences: she was the first in her family to graduate from college .
her family was extremely proud and many of them traveled far to attend her graduation .
several dozen students from her class were graduating .
each time a student crossed the stage | the audience broke into applause .
afterwards friends and family gathered around to offer their congratulations .
output.sentences: A girl graduated from high school.
Her entire family was there to support her.
She sat with her graduating class.
Her friends celebrated as they walked across the stage.
She took photos with her friends and family after the ceremony.
